results.content: I wanted to deepen my understanding of JavaScript fundamentals i.e. how JS works and why it works the way it does. This course has given me that depth of understanding. I will be taking Asim's Asynchronous JavaScript course next, as I find his teaching style to be very effective.
results.content_html: I wanted to deepen my understanding of JavaScript fundamentals i.e. how JS works and why it works the way it does. This course has given me that depth of understanding. I will be taking Asim's Asynchronous JavaScript course next, as I find his teaching style to be very effective.

results.content: It's a course that allow us to discover new things and understand others that we already know. It's very well explained, thank you Asim :)
results.content_html: It's a course that allow us to discover new things and understand others that we already know. It's very well explained, thank you Asim :)

results.content:
I want to thank asim for investing his time to make this course, It was a good course for me to revise some of the core concepts.

However i would rate this course as 3 star, cause of few reasons, course content is outdated, practical examples are not used, for 1 example in async section example could have been better explained via fetching things from APIs. 

Overall a good course, for experienced developers a good refresher, and so beginners scope of learning is there. Thanks you asim.
results.content_html:
I want to thank asim for investing his time to make this course, It was a good course for me to revise some of the core concepts.

However i would rate this course as 3 star, cause of few reasons, course content is outdated, practical examples are not used, for 1 example in async section example could have been better explained via fetching things from APIs.

Overall a good course, for experienced developers a good refresher, and so beginners scope of learning is there. Thanks you asim.

results.content: I loved the course. Great insight into JavaScript. I would recommend this to all web developers.
